title: dogs_resting_under_morning_sunlight
summary: Dogs resting and sunbathing during warm morning sunlight.
description: This record documents dogs resting on the ground while sunbathing as morning sunlight becomes fully available. The behavior is consistent with thermal regulation during cold-season mornings and reflects environmental comfort conditions rather than directed activity.

linked_references.note: Sunlight intensity observed to be increasing toward full morning availability.
Morning temperature and humidity conditions during cold season.
Duck coop temperature record providing thermal context.

external_reference.note: Image documents dogs resting under warm morning sunlight.
